client.map.presenters

Class MapPlayingState

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.map.presenters.MapPlayingState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapControllerState

    public class MapPlayingState
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapControllerState
    This is the state that is the currentMapState when it’s player’s turn. In this state almost all of the methods in the MapController will actually place settlements and roads (of course depending on if they can.). The initFromModel() method will paint the entire board and allow piece placement, the playing of development cards, and the offering of trades. This state will transition the the MapInactiveState when the player ends their turn.
    Version:
    1.0 Build Feb, 2016.
    Author:
    Christian Riboldi, Clayton Condie, Jacob Brewer, Joshua Powers, Joshua Van Steeter
